Pre-Game Insights: The Houston Rockets start the season at home against the Charlotte Hornets.
The Rockets averaged 24.8 assists per game on 41.8 made field goals last season.
The Hornets shot 46.0% from the field and 35.5% from 3-point range last season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets are favored by 7 points.
Cody Martin is day to day with a wrist injury and Mark Williams is out with a foot injury.
Others: The game is scheduled for Wednesday at 8 p.m. EDT.
